pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, November 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Edmonton, Don Iveson.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 9:00 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mexico Undersecretary for North America, Jesús Seade.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 10:00 a.m.

Media appearance

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the launch of CTV’s Toy Mountain campaign.
